products.name: XX99 Mark II Headphones
products.title: XX99 Mark II Headphones
products.description: The new XX99 Mark II headphones is the pinnacle of pristine audio. It redefines your premium headphone experience by reproducing the balanced depth and precision of studio-quality sound.
products.features:
Genuine leather head strap and premium earcups for superior comfort.
Intuitive controls designed for any situation, including auto on/off and pause features.
Advanced Active Noise Cancellation with built-in equalizer for personalized audio experience.
Bluetooth 5.0 compliant connectivity with 17-hour battery life.
Modern design aesthetic.

products.name: XX59 Headphones
products.title: XX59 Headphones
products.description: Enjoy your audio almost anywhere and customize it to your specific tastes with the XX59 headphones. The stylish yet durable versatile wireless headset is a brilliant companion at home or on the move.
products.features:
Durable, high-quality materials for travel-friendly design.
Compact folding design for comfort and minimalist style.
Latest wireless technology for audio synchronization with videos.
Built-in microphones for clear, hands-free calling.
30-hour battery life with rapid USB-C recharging.

products.name: XX99 Mark I Headphones
products.title: XX99 Mark I Headphones
products.description: As the gold standard for headphones, the classic XX99 Mark I offers detailed and accurate audio reproduction for audiophiles, mixing engineers, and music aficionados alike in studios and on the go.
products.features:
Over five decades of audio expertise.
Industrial, aerospace-grade materials for durability.
Handcrafted microfiber ear cushions and robust metal headband for comfort.
27 dB of passive noise cancellation with closed-back design.
Specially tuned cable with balanced gold connector.
